== Cansaulim (626883) ==

Cansaulim is a village in the [[Mormugao]] taluka of [[South Goa]] district with an area of 190.62 hectares and harbouring 563 households with total population of 2219 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[MORMUGAO]] is at a distance of 15 km. Male population is 1058 and female population is 1161. Scheduled Caste Population is 32 and Scheduled Tribes population is 34. Census Location Code of the village is 626883<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
